high_descs: Turn to the left and straight to face the bed.
Pick the book up from off of the bed.
Turn around, go to the left, and face the nightstand.
Turn the lamp on that's on the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp while holding the book.

high_descs: Turn and go to the bed.
Pick up a book on the bed.
Turn and go to the nightstand by the bed.
Turn on the lamp on the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the nightstand.

high_descs: Turn to the left and stand in front of the bed.
Pick the book up from the bed.
Turn to the right and face the lamp on the night stand.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a book and turn on a lamp.
